page.title: 01Gazetteer.
page.content: Our area grows asparagus,leeks,lots of other vegetables and fruit.There was a village on this site in Saxon times called Herfortune.The village now has a mixture of black and white cottages and modern estates.There are about two thousand people living in Harvington.This area is also very famous for its {Blossom Trail }which runs through Harvington.The river Avon divides Harvington from the village of Offenham which is a local beauty spot.The Fish and Anchor Inn lies on the banks of the river and can be reached by a hand ferry from Harvington.The river provides for leisure and irrigation of the surrounding area.In Littleton there is a{Nature Conservation Area }called { {Windmill Hill.}We are four miles from Evesham,six from Alcester and thirteen from Redditch New Town.
